description:

As it turns out, one of the guys on our production team is into DP big time. He was excited at the opportunity to put his experience into practice!

Both of them pretty much said the same thing: "You want me to do what?"
But once the guys got together, the planets just aligned.
To say that Nicolas loved having two hot cocks inside him would be an understatement. He fucking loved it!
title: Double Stuffed
